name: Octavian Rotari
welcomeMessage: I’m an enthusiastic web developer recently moved to Edinburgh. I’m curently looking for job opportunitues and i want to meet other fellow coders.

courses.name: Makers Academy
courses.description: Donut cake danish jelly beans donut tart gingerbread. Cookie macaroon gingerbread lollipop sesame snaps sweet roll. Croissant cake sugar plum candy canes sesame snaps chocolate bar jelly beans cookie jujubes. Candy canes marzipan tootsie roll sugar plum macaroon halvah. Cake marshmallow topping caramels halvah sweet roll soufflé jujubes. Apple pie topping croissant toffee icing. Chocolate sesame snaps carrot cake tootsie roll wafermuffin ice cream tiramisu.
